Verses: 1 idho, Kerubeengaludaiya Thalaikkumel Irundha Mandalaththil Indhiraneelaraththinampondra Singaasana Saayalaana Oru Thotraththaik Kanden; Adhu Avaigalukkumel Kaanappattadhu.

2 avar Sanalnool Angi Thariththirundha Purushanai Nokki: Nee Kerubeenin Keezh Irukkira Sakkarangalukku Naduvile Pravesiththu, Kerubeengalin Naduve Irukkira Akkiniththazhalil Un Kai Niraiya Eduththu, Adhai Nagaraththinmel Iraiyendraar; Appadiye Avan En Kankaana Ulle Pravesiththaan.
3 andhap Purushan Ulle Pravesikkaiyil, Kerubeengal Aalayaththin Valadhu Puraththil Nindrana; Oru Megam Utpraagaaraththai Nirappitru.

4 karththarudaiya Magimai Kerubeenin Melirundhu Ezhumbi, Aalayaththin Vaasarpadiyile Vandhadhu; Aalayam Megaththinaale Niraindhirundhadhu, Praagaaramum Karththarudaiya Magimaiyin Pragaasaththinaal Nirampitru.
5 kerubeengaludaiya Settaigalin Iraichchal Sarvaththukkum Valla Dhevan Pesugaiyil Undaagum Saththampola Velippraagaaramattum Ketkappattadhu.

6 avar Sanalnool Angi Thariththirundha Purushanai Nokki: Nee Kerubeengalukkul Sakkarangalin Naduvilirundhu Akkiniyai Edu Endru Kattalaiyittavudane, Avan Ulle Pravesiththu Sakkarangalandaiyile Nindraan.

7 appozhudhu Kerubeengalukkulle Oru Kerubeen Than Kaiyaik Kerubeengalin Naduvil Irukkira Akkiniyil Neetti, Adhil Eduththu, Sanalnool Angi Thariththirundha Purushanudaiya Kaiyil Koduththaan; Avan Adhai Vaangik Kondu Veliye Vandhaan.
8 kerubeengaludaiya Settaigalin Keezh Manushar Kaiyin Saayalaanadhu Kaanappattadhu.
9 idho, Kerubeengalandaiyil Naalu Sakkarangal Irukkak Kanden; Ovvoru Kerubeen Andaiyil Ovvoru Sakkaram Irundhadhu; Sakkarangalin Thotram Padigappachchai Varunampolirundhadhu.
10 avaigal Naalukkum Ore Saayalaana Roobam Irundhadhu; Sakkarangalin Naduvile Sakkaram Irukkumaappol Kaanappattadhu.
11 avaigal Odugaiyil Thangal Naalu Pakkangalilum Odum; Odugaiyil Avaigal Thirumbinadhillai; Thalainokkum Idaththukke Avaigal Adhin Pinnaale Odina; Odugaiyil Avaigal Thirumbinadhillai.

12 avaigalin Udal Anaiththum, Avaigalin Mudhugugalum, Avaigalin Kaigalum, Avaigalin Settaigalum, Andha Sakkarangalum, Sutrilum Kangalinaale Niraindhirundhana; Avaigal Naalukkum Irundha Sakkarangalum Appadiye Irundhana.
13 andha Sakkarangalaip Paarththu; Sakkarame Endru Oruvan Kooppidugira Saththaththaikketten.
14 ovvondrukkum Naalu Mugangal Irundhana; Mudhalaam Mugam Kerubeen Mugamum, Irandaam Mugam Manushamugamum, Moondraam Mugam Singamugamum, Naalaam Mugam Kazhugumugamumaayirundhadhu.
15 kerubeengal Mele Ezhumbina; Idhudhaan, Naan Kebaar Nadhiyandaiyile Kandirundha Jeevan.
16 kerubeengal Sellugaiyil Sakkarangal Avaigal Aruge Odina; Boomiyilirundhu Ezhumbak Kerubeengal Thangal Settaigalai Viriththapodhu, Sakkarangalum Avaigalai Vittu Vilagippogavillai.
17 avaigal Nirkaiyil Ivaigalum Nindrana; Avaigal Ezhumbugaiyil Ivaigalum Ezhumbina; Jeevanudaiya Aavi Ivaigalil Irundhadhu.
18 karththarudaiya Magimai Aalayaththin Vaasarpadiyaivittup Purappattu, Kerubeengalinmel Nindradhu.

19 appozhudhu Kerubeengal Thangal Settaigalai Viriththu, En Kan Kaana Boomiyaivittu Ezhumbina; Avaigal Purappadugaiyil Sakkarangalum Avaigalukku Sariyaai Sendrana; Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Kizhakku Vaasalile Poi Nirka, Isravelin Dhevanudaiya Magimai Avaigalinmel Uyara Irundhadhu.
20 idhu Naan Kebaar Nadhiyandaiyile Isravelin Dhevanukkuk Keezhe Irukkakkanda Andha Jeevandhaane; Avaigal Kerubeengal Endru Arindhukonden.
21 avaigalil Ovvondrukku Naalu Mugamum, Ovvondrukku Naalu Settaigalum Irundhana; Avaigaludaiya Settaigalin Keezh Manushakaigalin Saayal Irundhadhu.
22 avaigaludaiya Mugangal Naan Kebaar Nadhiyandaiyile Kandirundha Andha Mugangalin Saayalaayirundhadhu; Ovvondrum Thanthan Mugaththukku Edhiraana Thisaiyai Nokki Sendradhu.
